1424.name: S2 CrMo2
1424.Applications: Typical applications in power generation plant include steam piping, turbines and boilers; the alloy also finds applications in the chemical and petro-chemical industries.
1424.Suitable_For: ASTM: A182 grade F22, A199/A200 grades T21/T22, A213 grade T22, A217 grade WC9, A234 grade WP22, A335 grade P22, A387 grades 21/22 10CrMo 9-10, 10CrSiMoV 7, G-17CrMo 9-10
